info.readme:
This package creates AlphabetFolders for the specified doctype for Umbraco 8
Behavior
- When you create a document with doctype "itemDocType", this package will automatically create alphabet folders for it - When you edit the name, the document is automatically moved to the correct alphabet folder - Automatically cleans up empty alphabet folders - Orders the alphabet folders and items inside the alphabet folders by with every action
Configuration
Add these keys/values to your appSettings section in the web.config: - Key: "alphabetfolders:ItemDocType" - the doctype alias to create alphabetfolders for - comma separated values are allowed for multiple doctype aliases - Key: "alphabetfolders:FolderDocType" - the doctype to use for creating the alphabet folders (e.g "AlphabetFolder")
